action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Stockholm
TO: Dresden
BY: Train
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: Next Sunday

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: Ok.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  Does the travel agent know where your trip is starting? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know where the trip is starting yet.
action.label: forget

action.content: no
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.

action.label: forget

action.label: forget

action.content: no
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.

action.content: NA

action.label: forget

action.content: No. ASIDE: The travel agent needs to be informed about my preference for traveling by train from Stockholm to Dresden.
action.label: forget

action.content: NA
